oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Family montage from Spirit Magazine commemorative issue
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hooks, Benjamin L.; Hooks family; magazines;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photo montage of seven family photos featuring members of the Hooks family. Appeared as page 15 of the June 2010 commemorative issue of Spirit.
